name: LD47 - Commuter
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

Press SPACE or ESC to open the pause menu. (Space is handy for playing the WebGL version in fullscreen!)

  1. Before a level starts, place towers or traps by clicking the checkbox on the left. Each map will have a different max number of traps and towers which you can place.
  2. Hit start level!
  3. Click traps to activate them for a period of time. Click and drag the mouse to shove cars around with your awesome wind powers. Be careful not to run out of juice!

Limbo is filling up with bad drivers who have been sentenced to an eternity of commuting. It’s time for you to make some space by commuting their sentences as fast as you can. Use traps, towers, and your inexplicable godlike powers to send them tumbling, drifting, and exploding into the afterlife.

Do it fast enough, and you’ll even earn yourself a gold medal! Shiny.

We’ve also included a level editor in the PC and Mac builds for you to make your own levels! Customize everything from the track to how hard it is and how many items players are allowed to use!

Made by these folks for Ludum Dare 47:

  • Programming
    • Aran Ink (@nesciosquid)
    • Andrew Wesson
    • Jordan Faas-Bush (@quickpocket)
  • Music
    • Alex Katz (https://www.alexkatzmusic.com/)
  • Art 
    • Rubén Carral (https://maaot.itch.io/)
